results.name: First differences of A256260.
comment: First 27 terms agree with A169708. Both sequences share infinitely many terms.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Catalog of Toothpick and Cellular Automata Sequences in the OEIS
Index entries for sequences related to cellular automata
example: Written as an irregular triangle in which the row lengths are the terms of A011782, the sequence begins:
It appears that the row sums give A000302.
It appears that the right border gives A173033.
